file.name: schema.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Open SEC Data API Documentation
  description: |
    This is documentation on how to access Form Thirteen (13F) SEC filing data through an API.
  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about accessing SEC data.
  url: https://www.sec.gov/edgar/searchedgar/accessing-edgar-data.htm
paths:
  /api/filing-periods/:
    get:
      operationId: RetrieveFilingPeriods
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/filings/:
    get:
      operationId: RetrieveFilingViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/holdings/:
    get:
      operationId: RetrieveHoldingViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/holdings/{cik}/:
    get:
      operationId: holdings_by_cikHoldingViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cik
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/holdings/{cik}/historical/{cusip}/:
    get:
      operationId: historical_holdings_by_cikHoldingViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cik
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: cusip
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cik/:
    get:
      operationId: cik_listCikViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cusip/:
    get:
      operationId: cusip_listCusipViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cusip/{cusip}/historical/:
    get:
      operationId: historical_cusip_average_priceCusipViewSet
      description: 'Calculate the average price of a security per quarter

        by dividing the total sum of all holdings for a CUSIP

        by the total number of shares reported by all filers'
      parameters:
      - name: cusip
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cusip/{cusip}/{period}/:
    get:
      operationId: RetrieveCusipViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cusip
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: period
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cusip/{cusip}/cik/{period}/:
    get:
      operationId: cik_by_cusipCusipViewSet
      description: "Show all Investors that hold a security (CUSIP)\nwith details\
        \ for each investor including:\n    - first Quarter held\n    - Current period\
        \ total value and total total_shares\n    - cik number / filing name"
      parameters:
      - name: cusip
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: period
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cik/{cik}/portfolio/period/:
    get:
      operationId: portfolio_by_periodCikViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cik
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cik/{cik}/portfolio/summary/:
    get:
      operationId: listportfolio_summarys
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cik
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: ''
  /api/cik/{cik}/portfolio/historical/:
    get:
      operationId: historical_portfolio_valueCikViewSet
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: cik
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/funds/scatterplot/{period}/:
    get:
      operationId: Retrievefunds_scatterplot
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: period
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ''
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: ''
  /api/dashboard/:
    get:
      operationId: listdashboards
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: ''
